mapper.select: select mem_nickname from ani_member where kakao_id = #{kakao_id}
mapper.insert: insert into ani_member (mem_id, mem_nickname, kakao_id, mem_point, mem_profile_img) values('member'||lpad(seq_member.nextval,5,0), #{mem_nickname}, #{kakao_id}, #{mem_point}, #{mem_profile_img})

insert into ani_dog (dog_id, dog_name, dog_type, dog_info, dog_birth, mem_id) values('dog'||lpad(seq_dog.nextval,5,0), #{dog_name}, #{dog_type}, #{dog_info}, #{dog_birth}, 'member'||lpad(seq_member.currval,5,0))

insert all
into ani_dog_img values ('dog_img'||lpad(seq_dog_img.nextval,5,0), #{file}, 'dog'||lpad(seq_dog.currval,5,0))
select * from dual
mapper.select: select * from ani_dog d left outer join ani_member m on d.mem_id = m.mem_id left outer join ani_dog_img i on i.dog_id = d.dog_id where mem_nickname=#{mem_nickname}
